# GraphQL Server Example

This example shows how to implement a **GraphQL server with TypeScript** based on [Prisma Client](https://github.com/prisma/prisma2/blob/master/docs/prisma-client-js/api.md), [graphql-yoga](https://github.com/prisma/graphql-yoga) and [GraphQL Nexus](https://nexus.js.org/). It is based on a SQLite database, you can find the database file with some dummy data at [`./prisma/dev.db`](./prisma/dev.db).

cd prisma-examples/typescript/graphql
